short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy a tranquil and heartwarming scene with this serene sunset background

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The soft pinks and purples of the sky blend harmoniously with the gentle glow of the setting sun, casting a dreamy, ethereal atmosphere over the landscape. Clouds streak the sky, adding to the calm, reflective mood, making this the perfect backdrop for moments of relaxation and contemplation.
